movies.title: Donald's Vacation
movies.plot: Donald takes a kayak trip. When he gets to his campsite, he unloads the kayak, fights with his folding chair, and goes to sleep. Meanwhile, the chipmunks of the forest (precursors of Chip 'n Dale), attracted by his squawking, make off with the huge pile of food he carelessly unloaded. They get the attention of a bear, who Donald is soon battling.

biography.bio: Clarence Nash was born on December 7, 1904 in Watonga, Oklahoma, USA as Clarence Charles Nash. He was an actor, known for The Three Caballeros (1944), Mickey and the Beanstalk (1947) and Mickey's Christmas Carol (1983). He was married to Margaret Seamans. He died on February 20, 1985 in Glendale, California, USA.
biography.name: Clarence Nash
